title: Alright Riot, if fixing the queue system was too hard, let me help you.
body:
1. Scrap Dynamic Queue. Don't care what this means in terms of your business model, it was a mistake.

2. Bring back Teambuilder.

3. Make it so players select and queue for a position by selecting a role, a champion, and one champion "a ban, if you will" that they don't want to play against. There should be a solo-queue, a 2/3 man queue, and a five man queue.

4. Matches are made instantly with no pre-game lobby (unless you want one, that does sound a little too streamlined).

5. Laugh and pretend nobody was responsible for the bullshit that has occurred over the last 2 months.

6. Wipe away your tears of joy with stacks of $100 bills.

IT WAS THAT EASY, I SWEAR.
